THE_MARKERS_YOU_KEEP_WILL_BE_SAFE_AND_PR: The markers you keep will be safe and public (if you wish...).
YOU_CAN_PUBLICLY_SHARE_THE_BOOKMARKS_YOU: You can publicly share the bookmarks you want
ARE_YOU_A_DEVELOPER_YOU_CAN_CONTRIBUTE_T: Are you a developer? You can contribute to the project by improving its source code
DO_YOU_REMEMBER_YOUR_PASSWORD_YET: Do you remember your password yet?
RECOVER_PASSWORD_TEXT: Please enter your email address below and we will send you your new password
VALUE_EMAIL: This field must be a valid email
UNKNOWN_PETITION_ERROR: There was an unknown error in your petition. Try again later
WARNING_TEXT: Bookmarks you have in public can be seen by anyone, if they have the corresponding URL
DELETE_BOOKMARK_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure do you want to delete this bookmark?
TITLE: Title
WHEN_DOES_THE_PUBLIC_BOOKMARK_EXPIRE: When does the public bookmark expire?
DELETE_FOLDER_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure do you want to delete this folder?
NAME: Name
ENABLE_MULTIMEDIA_DESCRIPTION: By enabling this option, the URLs you have, if they are images or videos, will be displayed inside the bookmark, being able to see the content without having to go to the link.
ENABLE_MULTIMEDIA_WARNING: If you enable this option, the bookmark list may consume more data
ENABLE_DARK_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Enabling this option will activate the dark mode in all sections of the app.
LEAVE_PASSWORD_EMPTY: Leave empty to not change it
LOGOUT_CONFIRMATION: Are yo sure do you want to log out?
WRITE_MORE_CHARACTERS: Write more characters in order to search...
